name: QrPngCanvasSplashOptions
summary: Paint splash/drip options for the canvas background.

properties.name: Colors
properties.summary: Optional multi-color splash palette. When set, a random entry is used per splash.

properties.name: Count
properties.summary: Number of splash blobs to draw.

properties.name: SpreadPx
properties.summary: How far splashes can extend beyond the QR bounds.

properties.name: Placement
properties.summary: Where splashes are placed. Defaults to .

properties.name: EdgeBandPx
properties.summary: Optional edge band width (in pixels) when is . When 0, a sensible band is derived from splash size and spread.

properties.name: Seed
properties.summary: Random seed used to place splashes. Use 0 to auto-randomize per render.

properties.name: DripChance
properties.summary: Chance (0..1) that a splash will include a downward drip.

properties.name: ProtectQrArea
properties.summary: When true, never draws inside the QR area.

properties.name: QrAreaAlphaMax
properties.summary: Maximum alpha allowed inside the QR area when is false. Set to 0 to apply no alpha limit.
